story.title: Ivy's Underground Caves Adventure
story.summary: A young girl named Ivy discovers that lost treasure needs to be found in the underground caves. With help from a fairy and a crystal ball, they embark on an adventure to save the day.
scenes: young girl Ivy arriving at the underground caves for the first time
Ivy noticing that lost treasure needs to be found
Ivy meeting a fairy who explains the problem
The fairy telling Ivy about the legendary crystal ball
Ivy and the fairy deciding to work together
Ivy and the fairy exploring the depths of the underground caves
Discovering clues about where to find the crystal ball
Ivy solving a puzzle using clever thinking in the underground caves
The fairy protecting Ivy from danger
Finding a secret passage in the underground caves
Meeting others affected by the problem: lost treasure needs to be found
Ivy rallying everyone to help solve the crisis
Finally finding the crystal ball in a hidden location
Learning how to use the crystal ball properly
The fairy showing unexpected courage
Ivy using the crystal ball to fix the problem: lost treasure needs to be found
The underground caves being restored to its former glory
Everyone celebrating Ivy and the fairy as heroes
Ivy saying goodbye to the fairy but promising to return
The underground caves now peaceful with Ivy as its protector
story.theme: underground caves_lost treasure needs to be found

art_style.name: Disney
art_style.coloring_style: Disney style black and white line art, smooth clean lines, classic style
art_style.cover_style: Disney animation style with magical colors, professional Disney cover
art_style.complexity: classic Disney character design with flowing clean lines
